entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being in a headlock by Millicent Bulstrode and whimpering in pain. She is also mentioned as having her wand forgotten on the floor.

entities.name: millicent bulstrode
entities.description: Millicent is described as being bigger than Harry Potter and putting Hermione in a headlock. She is also mentioned as having her wand forgotten on the floor.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is described as leaping forward to pull Millicent off Hermione and being smaller than Millicent.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is described as skittering through the crowd, looking at the aftermath of the duels, and trying to teach students how to block unfriendly spells. He also glances at Snape and looks away quickly.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as having black eyes that glint and looking malevolent. Lockhart glances at him and looks away quickly.

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is mentioned as being asked by Lockhart to be a volunteer pair with Finch-Fletchley for teaching how to block unfriendly spells.

entities.name: finch-fletchley
entities.description: Finch-Fletchley is mentioned as being asked by Lockhart to be a volunteer pair with Longbottom for teaching how to block unfriendly spells.

entities.name: macmillan
entities.description: Macmillan is mentioned as being helped up by Lockhart after the duels.

entities.name: fawcett
entities.description: Fawcett is mentioned as being helped by Lockhart after the duels.

entities.name: boot
entities.description: Boot is mentioned as being helped by Lockhart after the duels.

relationships.description: Harry Potter helps Millicent Bulstrode off Hermione.
Lockhart helps Macmillan up after the duels.
Lockhart helps Fawcett after the duels.
Lockhart helps Boot after the duels.
